name: R5-Patient-R4-Patient
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Patient into FHIR R4

element.display: Information about an individual or animal receiving health care services

target.display: Information about an individual or animal receiving health care services
target.comment: R5 `Patient` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient`

element.display: Whether this patient's record is in active use

target.display: Whether this patient's record is in active use
target.comment: R5 `Patient.active` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.active`
R5 `Patient.address` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.address`

element.display: The date of birth for the individual

target.display: The date of birth for the individual
target.comment: R5 `Patient.birthDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.birthDate`

element.display: A language which may be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health

target.display: A language which may be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health
target.comment: R5 `Patient.communication` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.communication`

R5 `Patient.communication.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Patient.communication.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Patient.communication.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.communication.id`

element.display: The language which can be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health

target.display: The language which can be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health
target.comment: R5 `Patient.communication.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Patient.communication.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `CodeableConcept` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Patient.communication.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Patient.communication.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Patient.communication.preferred` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.communication.preferred`

element.display: A contact party (e.g. guardian, partner, friend) for the patient

target.display: A contact party (e.g. guardian, partner, friend) for the patient
target.comment: R5 `Patient.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contact`
R5 `Patient.contact.address` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contact.address`

R5 `Patient.contact.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Patient.contact.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

R5 `Patient.contact.gender` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contact.gender` - gender has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `Patient.contact.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contact.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Patient.contact.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Patient.contact.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: A name associated with the contact person

target.display: A name associated with the contact person
target.comment: R5 `Patient.contact.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contact.name`

element.display: Organization that is associated with the contact

target.display: Organization that is associated with the contact
target.comment: R5 `Patient.contact.organization` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contact.organization`

element.display: The period during which this contact person or organization is valid to be contacted relating to this patient

target.display: The period during which this contact person or organization is valid to be contacted relating to this patient
target.comment: R5 `Patient.contact.period` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contact.period`
R5 `Patient.contact.relationship` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contact.relationship`

element.display: A contact detail for the person

target.display: A contact detail for the person
target.comment: R5 `Patient.contact.telecom` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contact.telecom`
R5 `Patient.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.contained`

element.display: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not

target.display: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not
target.comment: R5 `Patient.deceased[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.deceased[x]`

R5 `Patient.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Patient.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

R5 `Patient.gender` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.gender` - gender has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `Patient.generalPractitioner` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.generalPractitioner`
R5 `Patient.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.id`
R5 `Patient.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Patient.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.implicitRules`

R5 `Patient.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Patient.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: Link to a Patient or RelatedPerson resource that concerns the same actual individual

target.display: Link to another patient resource that concerns the same actual person
target.comment: R5 `Patient.link` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.link`

R5 `Patient.link.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Patient.link.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Patient.link.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.link.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Patient.link.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Patient.link.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The other patient or related person resource that the link refers to

target.display: The other patient or related person resource that the link refers to
target.comment: R5 `Patient.link.other` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.link.other`

R5 `Patient.link.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.link.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/link-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/link-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Organization that is the custodian of the patient record

target.display: Organization that is the custodian of the patient record
target.comment: R5 `Patient.managingOrganization` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.managingOrganization`
R5 `Patient.maritalStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.maritalStatus`
R5 `Patient.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.meta`

R5 `Patient.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Patient.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Whether patient is part of a multiple birth

target.display: Whether patient is part of a multiple birth
target.comment: R5 `Patient.multipleBirth[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.multipleBirth[x]`

element.display: A name associated with the patient

target.display: A name associated with the patient
target.comment: R5 `Patient.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.name`
R5 `Patient.photo` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Patient.photo` - photo has change due to type change: R5 `photo` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `photo`

element.display: A contact detail for the individual

target.display: A contact detail for the individual
target.comment: R5 `Patient.telecom` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.telecom`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Patient.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Patient.text`
